title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below as row['column1'], instead of using the alias name.
EB: According to SCL 78193 in the tracker, when selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the first column should be displayed using the alias name, row['column1'], instead of the original name of the column.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and double-click on the first column name.
